content: we definitely crocheted this skirt short so we want to say right up front that the length along with everything else is totally customizable we love stripes in the summer and had so much fun taking a break from sweaters and cardigans whenever you wear a crocheted skirt out there is a good chance you are going to get asked where did you buy it people are delighted and a little disappointed to hear it was made at home this pattern is super easy it is designed and written for beginners we have recently converted it into a made to measure pattern we believe that if you are going to take all this time to crochet your own beautiful clothing then it should fit perfectly to your desired measurements the manley striped easy crochet fitted skirt is a free and easy crochet pattern that is made to measure and size inclusive it is designed to be intuitive and is written for beginners
